segments.text: I see the woman standing by the sink, completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so intense, it makes me wonder what she's thinking about.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't help but notice the overflowing water spilling onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The chaos inside the kitchen feels so different from the peaceful garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think itâ€™s almost ironic how she remains oblivious to the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: As I watch the boy reach into the cookie jar, I feel a sudden pang of anxiety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he balances on that stool looks so precarious, I can't believe he hasn't fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
